value.title: GradeTracker!
value.updateDescription:
- Added Color Menu! Now you can fully customize the theme of the website if you dont like the preset one!
- Fixed a bunch of bugs!
value.feedback: Your project, "GradeTracker!", received positive feedback for its practical utility and visually appealing design. Voters appreciated the ability to track and analyze grades with features like graph generation, which helps visualize academic progress. One user specifically noted the humor in the cat images, indicating that the light-hearted elements enhance the user experience. However, there were some comments about competing projects having better demos or offering different functionalities. Overall, your project stands out for its usefulness and engaging interface, but consider enhancing the demo aspect to further solidify its appeal.

value.title: Countdown Anything!
value.feedback: Your project "Countdown Anything!" received positive feedback for its practicality and simplicity. Users appreciated its versatility as a countdown timer that can be set for any date and time, highlighting its usefulness for personal projects. One user specifically noted the appealing art style, which adds a nice touch to the overall experience. However, some voters compared it unfavorably to other projects, suggesting that while functional, it may lack additional features or complexity that could make it stand out more. A few users mentioned the need for improved layout and information presentation, which could enhance user experience. Overall, the project is well-received but could benefit from some enhancements to its design and functionality.

value.title: Discord Election Bot
value.feedback: The feedback for your Discord Election Bot project highlights its practical utility and interactive design, which are appreciated by users. Many voters noted the bot's features, such as creating elections and tracking votes, as key strengths. One user specifically mentioned the potential for improvement by adding customizable election rules and notifications, which could enhance user engagement. Additionally, while your project was favored for its originality and usefulness, it faced competition from other projects that had more visually appealing interfaces or clearer demos. Overall, your project is well-received, but consider the suggestions for added features to boost its versatility and user experience.

value.title: Brainfk Web Interpreter!
value.feedback: The feedback for the "Brainfk Web Interpreter" is largely positive, highlighting its unique niche and practical features. Users appreciate the clean interface, ease of use, and the interactive nature of the tool, which simplifies learning and testing Brainfuck code. One user specifically noted the potential for improvement by suggesting the addition of direct text input for testing and a more retro aesthetic, such as pixelated fonts. While some voters found the concept not entirely original, many acknowledged the project's polished user experience and engaging elements, like humor and useful functionalities. Overall, the project is well-received for its creativity and technical execution, but there are opportunities for enhancement in functionality and design.

value.title: Discord Chess Bot
value.updateDescription: Added new Features such as color selection and /board command, fixed some major bugs, made the game overall playable
value.feedback: The Discord Chess Bot has received positive feedback for its functionality and user-friendly design, with many users appreciating its integration into Discord and the ability to play chess in a familiar environment. One user specifically noted that the bot's updates have improved its usability, including features like color selection and bug fixes. Some voters expressed that the project is innovative and practical, making it a valuable tool for chess enthusiasts. However, there were also comments indicating that not everyone is familiar with chess, which may limit its appeal to a broader audience. Overall, the project is well-regarded in terms of technical execution and gameplay experience.

value.title: RPI Memory Game!
value.feedback: The "RPI Memory Game!" project has received positive feedback for its clean design and engaging gameplay, with users noting its nostalgic appeal reminiscent of "Purble Place." One user specifically highlighted its potential for future enhancements, such as new game modes. However, there are suggestions for improvement, including clearer instructions for keyboard controls and a preference for more original artwork over AI-generated images. Overall, while the project is well-received, addressing these areas could enhance user experience.

value.title: SubjectTracker
value.feedback: SubjectTracker has received positive feedback for its functionality and usefulness, particularly in enhancing study efficiency and organization for students. Users appreciate features like subject management, task tracking, and note-taking, which contribute to its value as an all-in-one learning tool. However, some feedback highlights the need for improvements in the user interface and backend work, indicating that while the project is effective, it could benefit from a more polished design. One user specifically noted that the menu options were reversed, stating, "the 64 px option and 4 px option are backwards," which is a crucial detail to address. Overall, the project shows promise but requires some refinements to fully meet user expectations.

value.title: Doubloon Economy Bot!
value.feedback: Your project, "Doubloon Economy Bot!", has received positive feedback for its innovative approach and strong integration with Discord, making it a valuable tool for managing virtual currency. Users appreciate the bot's functionality and the potential for real-time information from highseas. One user specifically noted the need for a more useful demo, which could enhance user experience. However, there were some critiques regarding the randomness of CO2 values in another project, suggesting that ensuring accuracy in your project's features could further improve its usability. Overall, the project is viewed as solid and engaging, with room for refinement.

value.title: GradeTracker!
value.feedback: GradeTracker! has received positive feedback for its user-friendly interface, practical features, and polished design. Users appreciate the ability to track grades over time and the integration with chart.js for visualizing data. However, some noted that the grade tracking functionality could be enhanced, and there were issues with account registration for custom setups. One user specifically mentioned that while GradeTracker! is functional and visually appealing, it could benefit from improved features to make it even more versatile. Overall, the project is well-received, but there are opportunities for further development and refinement.

value.title: Custom Arch Linux hyprland rice + rofi
value.feedback: Your project, "Custom Arch Linux hyprland rice + rofi," received a mix of positive feedback highlighting its aesthetic appeal and the effort put into creating a visually pleasing Linux setup. Many voters appreciated the unique design elements, such as the rounded windows and the effective use of Rofi as an application launcher. One user specifically noted that while your project lacks a hosted website, the overall concept and execution were commendable, especially in the context of learning and experimentation. However, some feedback pointed out that a better demo could enhance the project's presentation. Overall, your work is seen as creative and attractive, with potential for others to adapt elements of your configuration for their own use.
